query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_prediction_models (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  model_type ENUM('health_decay','failure_prediction','anomaly_detection','remaining_life','maintenance_scheduling') NOT NULL,
  target_device_types JSON,
  target_device_ids JSON,
  target_group_ids JSON,
  input_features JSON NOT NULL,
  output_metric VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  algorithm ENUM('linear_regression','random_forest','gradient_boosting','neural_network','lstm','arima','prophet') DEFAULT 'gradient_boosting',
  hyperparameters JSON,
  training_config JSON,
  prediction_horizon_days INT DEFAULT 30,
  confidence_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.70,
  alert_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.80,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  last_trained_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  training_accuracy DECIMAL(5,4),
  validation_accuracy DECIMAL(5,4),
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_pred_model_type (model_type),
  INDEX idx_pred_model_active (is_active)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_prediction_models (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  model_type ENUM('health_decay','failure_prediction','anomaly_detection','remaining_life','maintenance_scheduling') NOT NULL,
  target_device_types JSON,
  target_device_ids JSON,
  target_group_ids JSON,
  input_features JSON NOT NULL,
  output_metric VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  algorithm ENUM('linear_regression','random_forest','gradient_boosting','neural_network','lstm','arima','prophet') DEFAULT 'gradient_boosting',
  hyperparameters JSON,
  training_config JSON,
  prediction_horizon_days INT DEFAULT 30,
  confidence_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.70,
  alert_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.80,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  last_trained_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  training_accuracy DECIMAL(5,4),
  validation_accuracy DECIMAL(5,4),
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_pred_model_type (model_type),
  INDEX idx_pred_model_active (is_active)
);
